text: Ne namulekha okhulekha khwa khataru, shafuchililwa okhumukalusia tawe okhula ateshele omusatsa wundi, ne omusatsa oyo namulekha awo obubii bubulao nibenya okhukalukhanila, nibalola mbu balaliinda tsinzakho tsia Nyasaye, ne tsino nitsinzakho tsia Nyasaye etsia yenoosilinjia Abandu benya okhumanya
